From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Beachcomber continues on, fascinated by his new companion, but still
getting lost in the nature of the planet. Finally, after three hundred
years, he has come back to a planet with such organic beauty. He makes
sure to record a birds chirping as he passes by a tree, quite pleased in
its pleasant sound, and resolved to study it later. He heads to the top
of a hill, and stops, transforming. He points downward. "There, there's
Cliffjumper." he says extatically, pointing at a convoy of four robots
at the bottom.
__________________________

Cliffjumper keeps on driving, leading the rest of the newly joined
Autobots. His sensors catch a motion to his left. He transforms and
draws his gun, trying to make it out. "okay guys, there something over
there, but I can't tell if it's threatening or not." he says pointing up
the hill.
